means: 可能的人物，可能有的事

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"可行的"之意。
means: feasible ： 指完全可行，切实可行，强调成功的较大可能性。
possible ： 多用来消除对某事的怀疑，侧重从客观上看有存在或发生的可能。
practicable ： 强调经过证明是有效的，合乎实际，行得通的。

sentence.Network_en: He programmed his computer to compare all the possible combinations.
sentence.Network_cn: 他给他的计算机编制了一套程序，以比较所有可能的组合。

sentence.Network_en: They agreed to work co-operatively to ease tensions wherever possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们同意互相配合尽一切努力缓解紧张局势。

sentence.Network_en: It was imperative that he act as naturally as possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 最重要的是他要做到尽可能自然。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin possibilis, from posse 'be able'

entry.def: If it is possible to do something, it can be done.

example.ex: If it is possible to find out where your brother is, we shall...
example.tran: 如果能找出你兄弟在哪儿，我们就会去找。

example.ex: Everything is possible if we want it enough...
example.tran: 只要我们有足够的信念，任何事情都是有可能的。

entry.def: A possible event is one that might happen.

example.ex: He referred the matter to the Attorney General for possible action against several newspapers...
example.tran: 他把对几家报纸可能提起诉讼的事宜提交首席检察官来处理。

example.ex: Her family is discussing a possible move to America...
example.tran: 她的家人在讨论移居美国的可能。

entry.def: If you say that it is possible that something is true or correct, you mean that although you do not know whether it is true or correct, you accept that it might be.

example.ex: It is possible that there's an explanation for all this...
example.tran: 也许，对于所有这一切，会有一种解释。

example.ex: It was possible that Harry himself did not know what he had intended to do.
example.tran: 可能哈里本人都不清楚自己意欲何为。

entry.def: If you do something as soon as possible, you do it as soon as you can. If you get as much as possible of something, you get as much of it as you can.

example.ex: Please make your decision as soon as possible...
I want to learn as much as possible about the industry so that I'm better prepared...
example.tran: 我想尽可能多学一些关于这个行业的知识，让自己更有备无患。

entry.tran: （与形容词最高级连用，表示强调）最…的
entry.def: You use possible with superlative adjectives to emphasize that something has more or less of a quality than anything else of its kind.

example.ex: They have joined the job market at the  worst possible time...
example.tran: 他们在最不景气的时候进入了就业市场。

example.ex: We expressed in the clearest possible way our disappointment, hurt and anger...
example.tran: 我们清楚明白地表达了我们的失望、伤心和愤怒。

entry.tran: 如果可能的话；要是有可能的话
entry.def: You use possible in expressions such as 'if possible' and 'if at all possible' when stating a wish or intention, to show that although this is what you really want, you may have to accept something different.

example.ex: I need to see you, right away if possible.
example.tran: 我要见你，如果可能，马上。

example.ex: ...the moral duty to uphold peace if at all possible.
example.tran: 只要有可能就应维护和平的道义责任

entry.def: If you describe someone as, for example, a possible Prime Minister, you mean that they may become Prime Minister.

example.ex: Government sources are now openly speculating about a possible successor for Dr Lawrence...
example.tran: 官方消息人士在公开推测谁有可能成为接任劳伦斯博士的人选。

example.ex: Bradley has been considered a possible presidential contender himself.
example.tran: 布拉德利本人就被认为是总统职位的有力竞争者。

entry.def: The possible is everything that can be done in a situation.

example.ex: He is a democrat with the skill, nerve, and ingenuity to push the limits of the possible.
example.tran: 他是一个手腕高超、富有胆识、足智多谋的民主党人，能够让不可能的事成为可能。

sentences.sentence: "politics is the art of the possible"

sentences.sentence: "a breakthrough may be possible next year"

auth_sentence.res_content: If you believe in yourself, anything is possible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you believe in yourself, anything is possible.

auth_sentence.res_content: Ferree pays homage via just about every genre possible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ferree pays homage via just about every genre possible.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可能的, 可能存在或发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: poss可以,能够，有能力+ible表形容词→adj.可能的, 可能存在或发生的
possible[adj.可能的, 可能存在或发生的]+ly表副词→possibly可能地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可能性, 可能发生的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: poss可以,能够，有能力+ibility具备……性质的→可能性

Sentence.sentence: They need to extract as much information as possible from the first or second reading.
They should finish the work as soon as possible
Make as few marks as possible.
minister of social security, quickly commissioned a study to determine the causes of and possible cures for this disturbing stale of affairs.
It's possible to admire Oprah Winfrey and still wish Harvard hadn't awarded her an honorary doctor of law degree and the commencement(毕业典礼)speaker spot at yesterday's graduation
million jobs lost in the last three months, there is urgent desire to boost the economy as quickly as possible.

means.word_mean: 可能的, 可能存在[发生, 做到]的; 能做到（或取得）; 潜在的

sentences.en: He will get the great possible assistance.
sentences.cn: 他将获得尽可能大的帮助。

sentences.en: It's possible to break with old habits.
He thought it was possible that she would[might] come back that day.
sentences.cn: 他认为她那天有可能回来。

means.word_mean: 也许(会发生)的; 可能存在（或发生）的

sentences.en: They are ready against the possible invasion.
He is the only possible man for the position.
sentences.cn: 他是担任该职务的惟一合适人选。

jushi.english: He will get the greatest possible assistance.
jushi.chinese: 他将获得尽可能大的帮助。

jushi.english: They are ready against the possible invasion.
